card.text: Scourge of Geier Reach gets +1/+1 for each creature your opponents control.

card.name: Screeching Bat
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {2}{B}{B}. If you do, transform Screeching Bat.

attr.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {2}{B}{B}. If you do, transform Stalking Vampire.

card.name: Selfless Cathar
card.text: {1}{W}, Sacrifice Selfless Cathar: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Selhoff Occultist
card.text: Whenever Selhoff Occultist or another creature dies, target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Sensory Deprivation
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.

card.text: Exile target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature. Flashback {5}{B}{B}

Shimmering Grotto
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Skaab Ruinator

card.name: Skeletal Grimace
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "{B}: Regenerate this creature."

card.name: Skirsdag Cultist
card.text: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skirsdag Cultist deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Skirsdag High Priest
card.text: Morbid - {T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Put a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only if a creature died this turn.

card.name: Slayer of the Wicked
card.text: When Slayer of the Wicked enters the battlefield, you may destroy target Vampire, Werewolf, or Zombie.

card.name: Smite the Monstrous
card.text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Snapcaster Mage
card.text: Flash When Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.

card.name: Somberwald Spider
card.text: Reach Morbid - Somberwald Spider enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if a creature died this turn.

card.name: Spare from Evil
card.text: Creatures you control gain protection from non-Human creatures until end of turn.

card.name: Spectral Flight
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.

card.name: Spider Spawning
card.text: Put a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach onto the battlefield for each creature card in your graveyard. Flashback {6}{B}

card.name: Spidery Grasp
card.text: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+4 and gains reach until end of turn.

card.name: Splinterfright
card.text: Trample Splinterfright's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard. At the beginning of your upkeep, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

card.name: Stensia Bloodhall
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {3}{B}{R}, {T}: Stensia Bloodhall deals 2 damage to target player.

card.name: Stitched Drake

card.name: Stitcher's Apprentice
card.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Put a 2/2 blue Homunculus creature token onto the battlefield, then sacrifice a creature.

card.name: Stony Silence
card.text: Activated abilities of artifacts can't be activated.

card.name: Stromkirk Noble
card.text: Stromkirk Noble can't be blocked by Humans. Whenever Stromkirk Noble deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Stromkirk Patrol
card.text: Whenever Stromkirk Patrol deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Sturmgeist
card.text: Flying Sturmgeist's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. Whenever Sturmgeist deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Sulfur Falls
card.text: Sulfur Falls enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Mountain. {T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Think Twice
card.text: Draw a card. Flashback {2}{U}

card.name: Thraben Sentry
card.text: Vigilance Whenever another creature you control dies, you may transform Thraben Sentry.

card.name: Tormented Pariah
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Tormented Pariah.

attr.value: At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Rampaging Werewolf.

card.name: Traitorous Blood
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains trample and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Travel Preparations
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures. Flashback {1}{W}

card.name: Traveler's Amulet
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Tree of Redemption
card.text: Defender {T}: Exchange your life total with Tree of Redemption's toughness.

card.name: Trepanation Blade
card.text: Whenever equipped creature attacks, defending player reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a land card. The creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each card revealed this way. That player puts the revealed cards into his or her graveyard. Equip {2}

card.name: Tribute to Hunger
card.text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

card.name: Ulvenwald Mystics
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Ulvenwald Mystics.

attr.value: {G}: Regenerate Ulvenwald Primordials. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Ulvenwald Primordials.

card.name: Unbreathing Horde
card.text: Unbreathing Horde enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other Zombie you control and each Zombie card in your graveyard. If Unbreathing Horde would be dealt damage, prevent that damage and remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

card.name: Unburial Rites
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Flashback {3}{W}

card.name: Undead Alchemist
card.text: If a Zombie you control would deal combat damage to a player, instead that player puts that many cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Whenever a creature card is put into an opponent's graveyard from his or her library, exile that card and put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Unruly Mob
card.text: Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Unruly Mob.

card.name: Urgent Exorcism
card.text: Destroy target Spirit or enchantment.

card.name: Vampire Interloper
card.text: Flying Vampire Interloper can't block.

card.name: Vampiric Fury
card.text: Vampire creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Victim of Night

card.name: Village Bell-Ringer

card.name: Village Cannibals
card.text: Whenever another Human creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Village Cannibals.

card.name: Village Ironsmith

card.name: Wreath of Geists
